fullText.originalText: Tofu pillow charges iPhone 25 while sleeping, my goldfish started stock trading. The quilt automatically generates TikTok videos, wife says our baby speaks Python now
fullText.baseText: 豆腐枕头睡觉时能给iPhone25充电，我的金鱼开始炒股了，被子自动生成抖音视频，老婆说孩子会讲Python了
fullText.finalText: 养生豆腐枕，睡眠充电宝，鱼缸即大户室。智能鹅绒被，被窝里自动剪辑短视频，媳妇说娃都学会调用API了

fullText.originalText: Grape keyboard types by itself after drinking cola, neighbor's dog became my online girlfriend. The mouse pad grows organic vegetables, boss wants to IPO our kitchen
fullText.baseText: 葡萄键盘喝可乐后自己打字，邻居的狗成了我的网恋女友，鼠标垫种有机蔬菜，老板想让厨房上市
fullText.finalText: 机械葡萄轴，肥宅快乐水驱动码字。隔壁二哈变赛博女友，鼠标垫无土栽培，CEO要搞厨房IPO
